lead_paragraph: Louis van Gaal was a contender to take over as Belgium's coach but in the end made himself unavailable, Belgian newspapers reported on Friday two days after Roberto Martinez was handed the post.

headline.print_headline: Van Gaal Was Contender for Belgium Job, Newspapers Say
headline.main: Van Gaal Was Contender for Belgium Job, Newspapers Say

snippet: Louis van Gaal was a contender to take over as Belgium's coach but in the end made himself unavailable, Belgian newspapers reported on Friday two days after Roberto Martinez was handed the post....
